name: Legend of Himari 2: Heroes of Zaria
name_original: Legend of Himari 2: Heroes of Zaria
description:
Heroic AdventureBegin the game as novice heroes that want to become famous and help ordinary people. Complete quests of the town mayors, repel the onslaught of enemies, defeat bosses and gain fame and money!Unusual gameplayThe game is an unique mix of a simulator, RPG, action and clicker. Find and improve new heroes, get stars to buy new items and learn spells.BattlesThe battle happens in automatic mode: you have to monitor the health of your characters, cast their spells, use items and change the character placement, as the first hero takes most of the damage.HeroesEvery hero, in addition to three stats (strength, dexterity, endurance), can have a special perk and a spell. Use them wisely during the battle, so as not to lose heroes and win faster!Your partyGather your team of heroes, come up with unique tactics for battles. Traditional Tank, Healer, Thief and Warrior? Or would only you use brute force? Maybe you will seek help of the creatures of darkness, gaining victory with the blood of your heroes?DungeonsWhen you’re ready, send your heroes on the most dangerous adventure — clearing dungeons. A series of battles with a boss fight at the end await you, but the reward will be worth it.EventsMany randomly generated events will not make you bored! By gaining experience and getting more fame you will receive new, more challenging missions.More games about Himarihttps://store.steampowered.com/app/634340
